author: Daniel Wanburg
title: Larsa Pippen Net Worth
text:
Larsa Pippen was born on the 6th July 1974, in Chicago, Illinois USA, of Syrian and American ancestry. She is a model and television personality, but probably best known for her family relations as she is a wife of the former professional basketball player Scottie Pippen . Larsa has participated in the reality television show “The Real Housewives of Miami” (2011), “Kourtney and Kim Take Miami” (2011 – 2013) as well as “Big Pippen” (2013). She has been in the spotlight since 1997.
How much is the net worth of Larsa Pippen? It has been estimated by authoritative sources that the overall size of her wealth is as much as $14 million, as of the data given in the middle of 2016, the main sources of which are modelling, television as well as marriage.
Larsa Pippen Net Worth $14 Million To begin with, Larsa started her career as a model, despite her relatively short height of 1.57 meters, but helped by having perfect body measurements 90 – 60 – 90 cm. It is worth mentioning the fact that Larsa really rose to fame as a star of the reality television series “The Real Housewives of Miami” (2011), which is the spin-off from the reality television series “The Real Housewives”. The show focused on the professional and personal lives of women based in the particular city, in the case of Larsa it was Miami; the series debuted in 2011 and aired until 2013, although Larsa Pippen starred only in the first season of the series – her co-stars were Cristy Rice , Marysol Patton , Alexia Echevarria , Adriana de Moura and Lea Black , and the series was produced by Matt Anderson, Nate Green and Maty Buss, but was only moderately successful.
In addition though, Larsa Pippen appeared in the reality television series “ Kourtney and Kim Take Miami” (2011 – 2013) created by Ryan Seacrest and Jonathan Murray , in which Pippen landed a supporting role as a close friend Kim Kardashian . The series averaged 2.5 million viewers, which considerably increased the popularity as well as the net worth of Larsa Pippen and the other cast members.
In 2013, Larsa alongside her family starred in another television series entitled “Big Pippen” aired on WEtv. Pippen has had the opportunity to show her successful life in the roles of a mother and wife, promoted by the fame of husband Scottie .
What is more, Larsa Pippen is active in the social networking sites. She has 23,349 likes on her Facebook page; 844,000 followers on Instagram; as well as 7,660 tweets and 141,000 followers on Twitter. She updates the information and makes posts on social networking sites very often. To summarise, all the above mentioned engagements have increased the popularity and net worth of Larsa Pippen.
Finally, in the personal life of the model and reality television star, Larsa married the now retired NBA star Scottie Pippen in 1997, and the family has three sons and a daughter.
